channel.title: A ::tank command
channel.description:
Hey, does anyone know how i could make a ::tank command or someone could make it for me? the stats i want are 99hp 99 def 99 mage 99 range.
Thanks.

item.title: A ::tank command
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("whatever you want command called") && (playerRights >= 0,1,2,3 you pick.)) 
{
addSkillXP(14000000, 1); //99 def
addSkillXP(14000000, 3); //99 hp
addSkillXP(14000000, 4); //99 range
addSkillXP(14000000, 6); //99 mage
sendMessage("whatever you want it to say..");
}

Read full topic
